item.description:
Cassavettes will be doing another Tuesday night residency at TOAD in September. I've seen them there before and liked them. They'll be doing the early show (7PM), so it's not too bad for a "school night".

Mia Dyson, an Australian ARIA (Grammy) winner and now Cambridge resident, will be doing the 10PM slot. She's a more bluesy rock guitar player and I've wanted to see her also. I'll stay for at least some of that show.

Did I mention that it's FREE?

For more info:

Cassavettes on myspace (Roots/rock/Americana)

Mia Dyson on myspace (Blues/guitar/rock)

TOAD calendar

Come for either or both.
item.how_to_find_us: I will email my cell# to attendees
item.name: Cassavettes, Mia Dyson @ TOAD
